Lyric:
[00:16.95]On the night like this

[00:19.50]There’re so many things I want to tell you

[00:27.58]On the night like this

[00:29.98]There’re so many things I want to show you

[00:38.33]Cause when you’re around

[00:40.89]I feel safe and warm

[00:43.85]Cause when you’re around

[00:46.50]I can fall in love every day

[00:53.33]In the case like this

[00:55.71]There are thousand good reasons

[00:59.81]I want you to stay..
